trans-unit.source: /^(?:|I )should see (?P<count>\d+) "(?P<element>[^"]*)" in the (?P<index>\d+)(?:st|nd|rd|th) "(?P<parent>[^"]*)"$/
trans-unit.target: /^(?:|eu )devo ver (?P<count>\d+) "(?P<element>[^"]*)" no (?P<index>\d+)(?:º) "(?P<parent>[^"]*)"$/

trans-unit.source: (I )should see less than :count :element in the :index :parent
trans-unit.target: /^(?:|eu )devo ver menos que (?P<count>\d+) "(?P<element>[^"]*)" no (?P<index>\d+)(?:º) "(?P<parent>[^"]*)"$/

trans-unit.source: (I )should see more than :count :element in the :index :parent
trans-unit.target: /^(?:|eu )devo ver mais que (?P<count>\d+) "(?P<element>[^"]*)" no (?P<index>\d+)(?:º) "(?P<parent>[^"]*)"$/
